## ISingleInitialState interface

Optional initial state for [ISingleCallControl](./jabra-js.isinglecallcontrol.md)<!-- -->.

Used to set the initial state if the device was changed in the middle of a call, or to recover the state after device disconnections.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface ISingleInitialState 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [callActive](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.callactive.md) |  | boolean | Set to <code>true</code> to set device into a in-call state. |
|  [muted?](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.muted.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> <code>true</code> to mute the device and <code>false</code> to unmute. |
